name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in crafting high-performance backend solutions primarily using **Python**, **Go**, and robust databases like **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**. Proficient in leveraging cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, complemented by a strong understanding of container orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Adept at implementing **MLOps** strategies, integrating AI functionalities, and ensuring data governance and compliance with industry standards.

My technical skills are enhanced by deep experience in building scalable microservices and event-driven architectures, alongside expertise in managing observability with **OpenTelemetry** and improving application performance. Demonstrated success in fostering communication across teams to deliver solutions that meet business needs. Committed to continuous improvement and delivering secure applications aligned with compliance protocols.
